channel.title: causal inference on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Introduction to effect verification was written in Python
item.description: # TL;DR (Almost) reproduced the R source code of the book “Introduction to Effect Verification: Basics of Causal Reasoning/Econometrics for Correct Comparison” in Python. https://github.com/nekoumei/cibook-python In this article, the library is mainly for R! But I will explain the parts that are not so in Python Introduction of books https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0834JN23Y I think it’s quick to see it because the table of contents is on Amazon. .. It’s a very good book.
